title: What does a Struct Return?
selftext:
So coming from the land of javascript into rust I want to make sure my understanding of Structs is accurate and I'm not mixing up concepts.   


A struct is like a class?  


implementations are akin to how you add "methods" to the class  


I'm not exactly sure what a struct returns when it's actually called by a variable... so if anyone knows what that is called I'd really appreciate knowing.   


is there anything else I should know about structs in rust?
